Package engtelecom.poo

Class Cronometro

java.lang.Object
engtelecom.poo.Cronometro
public class Cronometro extends Object
The type Cronometro, a counter for hour, minutes and seconds. Receive x and y initial coordinates, size of the canvas. Receive the color of the segments when it's on or off.
Author:
Theodor Konrad Wojcikiewicz

    • Cronometro

      public Cronometro(double xInicial, double yInicial, int dimensao, Color corSegmentoLigado, Color corSegmentoDesligado)
      Instantiates a new Cronometro, a counter for hour, minute and seconds.
      Parameters:
      xInicial - the x initial
      yInicial - the y initial
      dimensao - the size
      corSegmentoLigado - the color of the segment when it's on
      corSegmentoDesligado - the color of the segment when it's off

  • Method Details

    • contador

      public int[] contador() throws InterruptedException
      The method responsible for count hour, minute and second.
      Returns:
      the int [ ] with hour, minute and second
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - the interrupted exception for every 1000 milliseconds that passed
